titleSection.name: VersionOne Integration for Buy A Feature
titleSection.shortDescription: Helps product planners collaborate with customers to better understand and prioritize their backlog.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Integration for Buy A Feature helps product planners collaborate with customers to better understand and prioritize their backlog. This integration bootstraps the creation of Buy A Feature Games from items in a VersionOne backlog. After virtual collaboration, Buy A Feature reports the game status and purchase counts back to VersionOne to help in the prioritization process.

updates.releaseNotes:
* New: Create Buy-a-Feature Online Game Definition from Feature Group (Theme) 
 * New: Create Buy-a-Feature Online Game Items from Backlog Items (Stories) 
 * New: Report summary game results from Buy-a-Feature Online to VersionOne

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: Buy a Feature
mediaSection.caption: Transition from traditional tools and project management practices without making everyone take a leap of faith.
